name: Gruffalo Park
description:
Programmed by Suhaimizs on GDevelop using an 'isometric template' with Minda the little girl as the main character. 

This virtual park game maybe useful for Primary School English teachers to engage young learners with the story of Gruffalo by Julia Donaldson. 

The story is based on a Chinese folk tale of a fox that borrows the terror of a tiger. Donaldson was unable to think of rhymes for "tiger" so instead she invented a word that rhymes with "know".
